content.description: Start sitting to the right of 'The Punisher' chimney on some low sidepulls. Using heel hooks, fight your way up to the top of this short, powerful line.
content.location: Located on the small boulder to the right of 'The Punisher' chimney. This is one of the boulders that forms the chimney.

content.description:
Pretty fun "trick" route. The crux is the last 5 ft including the top out.

The "V2" rating comes from the guide book, I think this one is pretty stiff.

Taller people might have a slight easier time reaching around for the top out.
content.protection: the sand is just fine for this one
content.location:
In the cave between the boulders that make up the Punisher area. Start in the back and work your way between the rocks.

How you top the problem is up to interpretation, although some ways certainly make it harder

content.description: "Move it" in espanish! Start out on the obvious right leaning flake at the bottom left of the boulder.  Make a few moves to the right, heading for the arete.  Follow the arete for a few moves towards the top.  Top out over the bulge.  The tall flake at the left of the boulder is off.
content.location: This problem is on the short boulder just North of the Hueco Traverse Boulder.  It will be right next to the path on the left if you're walking from the parking lot to the Mushroom at the west end of the boulder field.

content.description: Climb the left arete of the Punisher boulder.  SDS probably adds a couple of points.
content.location: La Derecha climbs the left side of the Punisher Boulder which is located between the Sand Traverse Boulder and the road.

content.description: Begin standing with right hand on blank arete, make the hard move to the bad crimp, better holds a bit further up. Really fun.
content.location: The obvious bulge on the punisher.

content.description:
Start sitting bear hugging what resembles a refrigerator using the right arete and a left hand sidepull.  Slap your way up into a bad crimp for your left hand and find a pinch on the arete for your right.  A few more stout moves puts you on the slab for an easy topout.

The stand start to this problem goes at V4 but felt awkward since you start in the middle of the crux.  Just sit it down.
content.location: Blankety Blank climbs the right side of the Punisher Boulder which is located between the Sand Traverse Boulder and the road.
